source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot begins on a stone patio overlooking a green field with horses grazing in the distance. The camera then tilts down to focus on the wet, stone-paved surface of the patio. Two potted plants sit at the edge of the patio where it meets the grass.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot begins on a stone patio overlooking a green field with horses grazing in the distance. The camera then tilts down to focus on the wet, stone-paved surface of the patio. Two potted plants sit at the edge of the patio where it meets the grass.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the camera's downward tilt and the grazing horses. However, it omits the semi-transparent overlay of the patio that is visible throughout the shot. It also fails to mention a dog that is briefly visible walking in the field alongside the horses. A more complete description would incorporate these missing visual elements.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This scenery shot begins on a stone patio overlooking a green field where two horses graze and a dog walks in the distance. A semi-transparent overlay of the patio's stone pattern is visible over the entire scene. The camera then tilts down to focus on the wet, stone-paved surface of the patio, where two potted plants sit at the edge of the grass.
